query:
SELECT id as "id!: i32", 
campaign_request_id as "campaign_request_id!: i32", 
topic_id as "topic_id!: i32" FROM campaign_request_topics WHERE (NOT $1::boolean OR id = $2::int4) AND (NOT $3::boolean OR campaign_request_id = $4::int4) AND (NOT $5::boolean OR topic_id = $6::int4) ORDER BY 
      (CASE ($7 = 'Id' AND NOT $8) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($7 = 'Id' AND $8) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($7 = 'CampaignRequestId' AND NOT $8) WHEN true THEN campaign_request_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($7 = 'CampaignRequestId' AND $8) WHEN true THEN campaign_request_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($7 = 'TopicId' AND NOT $8) WHEN true THEN topic_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($7 = 'TopicId' AND $8) WHEN true THEN topic_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
     LIMIT $9 OFFSET $10 FOR UPDATE
